item.title: TIL: How to convert a integer (32 bit) to binary using bitwise and bit-shift
item.description: Today I was exercising some competitive programming problems using Codility. The first problem named “Binary Gap” consists in a way to determine the longest zero occurrences in a binary string. The problem gives us a number and we should convert that number to a binary string then find the biggest consecutive zero occurrences in that binary string. This problem is classified as easy and I didn’t take too much time to solve it.
